item.description: Here I describe my project using Markdown formatting. An Informatician language that i learned at the University. My first project is an analysis of the biometry

item.title: Example Talk
item.description: Embed your slides or video here using shortcodes. Further details can easily be added using Markdown and $\rm \LaTeX$ math code.

item.title: Mon premier blog
item.description:
Le contenu ici

Mon premier blog

I like markdown formatting, it's a pretty interessant way to make analysis. To make analysis, we are doing charts so we learned how to make good charts and how to make analysis. For an exemple, we learned some way to compare different species with some "test" like Anova , Student,... We learned too how to make statistics, so it's really usefull to make our analysis
